title: I have a pixel 3 now and it doesn't work like the pixel one I can't find the square button on the bottom so that I can see what I've been using in the past I can't get to text to get some kind of special code that I'm supposed to put in open up some other part of the
content: There's no little square button like there was on the original pixel. How do I get to open apps so that I can switch between them and put in some kind of code that control is asking for
